title: The Wheel of Sour: Someone Has to Eat The World’s MOST SOUR Candy + Morgan Evans on singing with An Australian Accent + Eddie’s Babysitter Boyfriend Dilemma
itunes:title: The Wheel of Sour: Someone Has to Eat The World’s MOST SOUR Candy + Morgan Evans on singing with An Australian Accent + Eddie’s Babysitter Boyfriend Dilemma
description:
We spin the wheel of sour. Loser must try and keep the world’s most sour candy in their mouth for 20 seconds. Morgan Evans stops by to play some songs for us and Bobby tries to get him to sing with his Australian accent. Eddie wants to know what we think about his babysitter wanting to bring her boyfriend over to help watch his kids. We play a game where the show has to identify the movie by it’s theme song.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
